sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ProgramsService } from '../services/programs.service'; import { Programs } from '../programs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-programs', templateUrl: './programs.component.html', styleUrls: ['./programs.component.scss'] }) export class ProgramsComponent { programsList: Programs[] = []; loading: boolean = false constructor(private _program: ProgramsService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } getPrograms() { this.loading = true; this._program.getPrograms().subscribe({ next: (response) => { this.programsList = response; this.loading = false; }, error: (err) => { // show alert message with error console.log(err) this.loading = false; } }) } }
